text: The 1999–2000 EPIHL was the 3rd season of the English Premier Ice Hockey League, the sport's third tier, which is split into a Premier Division and a regionalized Division One. There is no automatic promotion to the British National League from the English League. In the Premier Division, teams met six times, three at home and three away, while in Division One sides played one home, one away in the North and two home, two away in the South.
